Coupon Model¶

class apps.coupon.models.Coupon(*args, **kwargs)¶

Coupon model Set a discount of a product using a unique string

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
active¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

can_use()¶

Check if the coupon can be used If it is activated then you can have a discount, else you have no discount

code¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

id¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

num_available¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

num_used¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

objects = <django.db.models.manager.Manager object>¶
use()¶

Updates the status of the coupon (decreases the expiration)

value¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.
